nodes.text: Thession was a terrestrial astronomical object in the galaxy where the rebel trooper Maediyu joined the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry sometime by the year 3 ABY. During a battle in the Kontahr sector that year, the First Sergeant Hazram Namir rescued Maediyu, remembering that she had been recruited from Thession.
Thession was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
